books_categories.title: 1. Shepherd and The Lost Sheep: A Motherless Child
books_categories.description: A Motherless Child – a gripping contemporary thriller novel that immerses readers in the tumultuous world of Tinashe, a young orphan entangled in a whirlwind of corruption. Follow Tinashe's journey as he navigates a society plagued by deceit, power struggles, and hidden agendas. As a motherless child, Tinashe's vulnerabilities become both his greatest strength and his most significant challenge. With an unyielding spirit and a relentless pursuit of truth, he uncovers a web of secrets that threaten to consume him.

events_categories.title: Events in Johannesburg, November 24, 2023
events_categories.description: Prepare to be transported to different worlds, as you delve into the intricate storytelling, vivid characterizations, and profound insights that grace the pages of these books. events_categories.title: Events in Harare, April 24, 2023
events_categories.description: By harnessing the principles of decentralization, transparency, and immutability, our app empowers users to take control of their digital lives. allEvents.title: Johannesburg Theatre
allEvents.description: As a token of our appreciation for your support, each book purchased during the event will be personally signed by the author. This unique opportunity to own a signed edition will make these books cherished keepsakes that will adorn your bookshelf and serve as a reminder of the magic that unfolds within their pages.

allEvents.title: Market Theatre
allEvents.description: Johannesburg, often called Jo'burg or Jozi, is the largest city in South Africa and serves as the economic and cultural hub of the country. It is a vibrant city known for its diverse population, rich history, and thriving arts and literary scene. The city has a strong tradition of supporting and promoting literature, making it an ideal location for your book launch.
